Lynn.Pranker Mills:
Pranker Mills, also known as the Iroquois Mills, are a former American textile mill located in Saugus, Massachusetts that was in operation from 1822 to 1915.


== Construction of dam and early mills ==
In 1770, Ebenezer Hawkes constructed a roughly made dam about five rods north of the old Saugus Iron Works dam. He also constructed a canal, a grist mill, and a saw mill.
